name: Sport Balloons FREE
description:
Hit all the Balloons that fall off the screen, but you wait that this Balloons start blinking frantically; Be careful of the bombs which is explosive to touch and will put a swift end your adventure.

Key Features:
-Game Center enabled.
- Great playability.
- Colorful graphics.
- Infinite longevity.
- Fun music.
- Cartoon sound effects.
- Different colored backgrounds.
Ideal for passing time.
